page.title: 07ROOFS OVER HEADS
page.content: { {HOUSING}in our area is all of good quality being a mixture of Local Authority and Private. Cockenzie,the older part, and Port Seton have both grown by areas over the years.{WHIN {PARK, THE LORIMERS}and{LINKS VIEW}are some of these. At the 1981 Census there were 1421 dwellings but that was largely before the Links View scheme. Housing is in the control of the E.Lothian District Council based in Musselburgh. A number of locals have for many years been staying in Residential caravans at Seton Sands Camp Site by their own choice. Numbers of people have bought their Council houses recently and have altered them in some way as a sign to others that they now own their house. These houses stand out very clearly from others.
